properties.areaDesc: Lake Superior from Saxon Harbor WI to Upper Entrance to Portage Canal MI 5NM off shore to the US/Canadian border including Isle Royal National Park; Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal MI; Black River To Ontonagon MI; Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 20 at 4:28PM EST until January 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy freezing spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or
greater expected, and may rapidly accumulate on vessels.
Southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and waves 7
to 12 feet expected.

* WHERE...Lake Superior from Saxon Harbor WI to Upper Entrance
to Portage Canal MI 5NM off shore to the US/Canadian border
including Isle Royale National Park, Black River to Ontonagon
MI, Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI and Ontonagon to Upper
Entrance of Portage Canal MI.

* WHEN...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, from 10 PM EST /9
PM CST/ this evening to 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Tuesday. For the
Gale Warning, from 1 AM EST /midnight CST/ Tuesday to 10 AM
EST /9 AM CST/ Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of
stability. Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ TUESDAY... ...GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ TUESDAY TO 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY
